main.name: Raunel Suarez-Magana
main.bio: Full Stack Web Developer, recently earned a certificate from the UT coding bootcamp. Graduated from the University of Texas at Austin with a bachelor's degree in Mathematics. Worked in education for four years. I'm excited to learn more about software development, and eager to work where I can improve education and users' lives.
main.contactmessage: I would love to connect with you. Shoot me an email or add me on linkedin!

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the programming languages I know. I still have a lot to learn, but I'm excited about improving!

work.description: Taught high school math to students of different levels and backgrounds. Created lessons and assessments.
